slide1.title: Auténtico Sabor Salvadoreño
slide1.description: Experience the true taste of El Salvador with our handmade pupusas, crafted from fresh masa and filled with wholesome ingredients, served with our signature curtido.

slide2.title: Cocina de la Abuela
slide2.description: Every dish follows generations-old family recipes, prepared with the same love and care that nourished our ancestors. This is comida con bendición.

slide3.title: Rico y Saludable
slide3.description: Savor the balance of delicious and wholesome. Our kitchen emphasizes fresh vegetables, locally sourced proteins, and traditional preparation methods for nourishing meals.

menu.title: Nuestra Cocina
menu.subtitle: Comida Hecha con Amor
menu.description: Browse our selection of traditional Salvadoran dishes made with fresh, wholesome ingredients. Each item is prepared daily with care and authenticity.

feature1.heading: Ingredientes Frescos y Locales
feature1.subheading: We source fresh produce and quality ingredients daily, supporting local farms for the most vibrant flavors.

feature2.heading: Tradición Familiar
feature2.subheading: Every recipe comes from generations of family tradition, prepared with the authentic techniques of Salvadoran home cooking.

feature3.heading: Opciones Saludables
feature3.subheading: Enjoy our selection of vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options, all made with the same care as our traditional dishes.

feature4.heading: Ambiente Acogedor
feature4.subheading: Relax in our warm, welcoming space that feels like home—perfect for family meals and friendly gatherings.

about.title: Nuestra Filosofía
about.heading: Hecho a Mano con Corazón, Elaborado con Cuidado
about.paragraph1: At Pupusería Mi Bendición, every dish begins with our commitment to 'Rico y Saludable'—delicious and healthy. We believe authentic flavor comes from respecting ingredients in their purest form. That's why we source fresh, local produce and prepare everything from scratch, just as our abuelas taught us.
about.paragraph2: Our kitchen is where tradition meets nourishment. From stone-ground masa to garden-fresh fillings, we craft each pupusa with mindful ingredients and generations of Salvadoran love. This isn't just food; it's comida con bendición—a wholesome blessing for your table.
